item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 7:30, so let's meet outside the theater at 7:00. After the movie we'll head to Friday's.

Please keep your RSVP up-to-date. And call me with any last-minute RSVPs, for directions, or to tell me you're running late.

Hope to see you Wednesday for Time Traveler's Wife!

--Dana
508/308-4897

OLD STUFF:
The Time Traveler's Wife was a best-selling novel. So for those of you who have read it and can't wait for the movie or for those of you who like sappy romance movies, this one's for you...

SUMMARY:
Clare has been in love with Henry her entire life. She believes they are destined to be together, even though she never knows when they will be separated: Henry is a time traveler--cursed with a rare genetic anomaly that causes him to live his life on a shifting timeline, skipping back and forth through his lifespan with no control. Despite the fact that Henry's travels force them apart with no warning, Clare desperately tries to build a life with her one true love.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet outside the theater doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Fridays (I'll bring the coupons!) to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update this meetup with a specific time a few days before, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for The Time Traveler's Wife!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: Time Traveler's Wife
